Sword Fall Leap [Attack Technique].name: Sword Fall Leap [Attack Technique]
Sword Fall Leap [Attack Technique].fullText:
Soaring Blade Attack 11Sword Fall Leap [Attack Technique]

You leap across the field of combat. When you attack, your blade work cuts one enemy deeply and slashes all foes nearby.

Encounter        Full Discipline, Implement, Psionic
Standard Action      Melee touch

Requirement: You must make this attack using a heavy blade.

Target: One creature

Attack: Dexterity vs. Reflex

Hit: 3d8 + Dexterity modifier damage, and each enemy adjacent to you takes damage equal to your Constitution modifier.


Sword Fall Leap [Movement Technique]

Encounter      Full Discipline, Psionic
Move Action      Personal

Effect: You make an Acrobatics check to jump with a +10 power bonus. You are considered to have a running start, and the distance of the jump isn’t limited by your speed.
Level 21: You make the Acrobatics check with a +20 power bonus.


Published in Psionic Power, page(s) 76.
Sword Fall Leap [Attack Technique].flavor: You leap across the field of combat. When you attack, your blade work cuts one enemy deeply and slashes all foes nearby.
Sword Fall Leap [Attack Technique].requirement: You must make this attack using a heavy blade.
Sword Fall Leap [Attack Technique].onHit: 3d8 + Dexterity modifier damage, and each enemy adjacent to you takes damage equal to your Constitution modifier.

Storm of Raining Blades.name: Storm of Raining Blades
Storm of Raining Blades.fullText:
Soaring Blade Attack 20Storm of Raining Blades

You are carried aloft by your psionic power, touching down three times to hack through and scatter your foes.

Daily        Implement, Psionic
Standard Action      Melee touch

Requirement: You must make this attack using a heavy blade.

Effect: Until the end of your turn, your movement does not provoke opportunity attacks. Before the attack, you fly 3 squares. If you don’t land at the end of this movement, you fall.

Primary Target: One creature

Primary Attack: Dexterity vs. Reflex

Hit: 1d8 + Dexterity modifier damage.

Effect: You fly 3 squares. If you don’t land at the end of this movement, you fall. You then make a secondary attack that is a melee touch attack.

  Secondary Target: One creature other than the primary target

  Secondary Attack: Dexterity vs. Reflex

  Hit: 2d8 + Dexterity modifier damage.

  Effect: You fly 3 squares. If you don’t land at the end of this movement, you fall. You then make a tertiary attack that is a close burst 1.

    Tertiary Target: Each enemy you can see in the burst

    Tertiary Attack: Dexterity vs. Reflex

    Hit: 15 + Dexterity modifier damage, and you slide the tertiary target 2 squares.

    Miss: Half damage, and you slide the target 1 square.


Published in Psionic Power, page(s) 76.
Storm of Raining Blades.flavor: You are carried aloft by your psionic power, touching down three times to hack through and scatter your foes.

Storm of Raining Blades.tertiaryTarget: Each enemy you can see in the burst
Storm of Raining Blades.secondaryOnMiss: Half damage, and you slide the target 1 square.

Charge the Clouds.name: Charge the Clouds
Charge the Clouds.fullText:
Soaring Blade Utility 12Charge the Clouds

You soar above the fight, avoiding your foes’ attacks as you pass.

Encounter        Psionic
Move Action      Personal

Effect: You fly your speed. This movement does not provoke opportunity attacks. If you don’t land at the end of this movement, you fall.


Published in Psionic Power, page(s) 76.
Charge the Clouds.flavor: You soar above the fight, avoiding your foes’ attacks as you pass.
Charge the Clouds.effect: You fly your speed. This movement does not provoke opportunity attacks. If you don’t land at the end of this movement, you fall.
